title: Gifts for Trading Land. . .iconography and content

content.question: Quick-to-See Smith's inclusion of cheap trinkets is intended to

choices.label: emphasize that most popular American sports are variations of Native American traditions
reference a history of exploitative economic transactions between Native Americans and Europeans
expose the low wages of Native American workers who labor in factories to mass-produce such goods
critique the art market's obsession with the skill and craftsmanship of American art

content.answer: reference a history of exploitative economic transactions between Native Americans and Europeans

topic.text: 10.2: Purpose and Audience in Global Contemporary Art

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe contextual elements of a work of art (or group of related works of art), including-  a. function.  b. context.  c. siting or physical context.  d. subject matter.  e. reception.
